Dgame.Math.Vector2



struct Vector2(T) if (isNumeric!(T));
Vector2 is a structure that defines a two-dimensional point.

Author:
rschuett

T x;
x coordinate

T y;
y coordinate

this()(T x, T y);
CTor

this(U)(U x, U y);
CTor

this(U)(ref const Vector2!(U) vec);
CTor

void opAssign(ref const Vector2!(T) rhs);
opAssign

Vector2!(T) opOpAssign(string op)(ref const Vector2!(T) vec);
Supported operation: +=, -=, *=, /= and %=

Vector2!(T) opOpAssign(string op)(T number);
Supported operation: +=, -=, *=, /= and %=

Vector2!(T) opBinary(string op)(ref const Vector2!(T) vec);
Supported operation: +, -, *, / and %

Vector2!(T) opBinary(string op)(T number);
Supported operation: +, -, *, / and %

const Vector2!(T) opNeg();
Returns a negated copy of this Vector.

pure nothrow void negate();
Negate this Vector

const pure nothrow bool opEquals(ref const Vector2!(T) vec);
Compares two vectors by checking whether the coordinates are equals.

const Vector2!(U) opCast(V : Vector2!(U), U)();
opCast:
cast this vector to another type.

const pure nothrow bool isEmpty();
Checks if this vector is empty. This means that his coordinates are 0.

const pure nothrow bool isUnit();
Check if this vector is a unit vector. That means that his length is 1.

const pure nothrow bool isOrtho(ref const Vector2!(T) vec);
Check if another vector is orthogonal to this.

const pure nothrow float scalar(ref const Vector2!(T) vec);
Calculate the scalar product.

alias dot = scalar;
alias for scalar

const pure nothrow float length();
Calculate the length.

const pure nothrow float angle(ref const Vector2!(T) vec, bool degrees = true);
Calculate the angle between two vectors. If the second paramter is true, the return value is converted to degrees. Otherwise, radiant is used.

const pure nothrow float diff(ref const Vector2!(T) vec);
Calculate the diff between two vectors.

pure nothrow Vector2!(T) normalize();
Normalize the vector in which the coordinates are divided by the length.

pure nothrow void set(T x, T y);
Set new coordinates.

pure nothrow void move(T x, T y);
Move the current coordinates.

const pure nothrow T[2] asArray();
Returns the Vector as static array.

alias Vector2s = Vector2!(short).Vector2;
Alias for short Vector

alias Vector2f = Vector2!(float).Vector2;
Alias for float Vector

alias Vector2b = Vector2!(byte).Vector2;
Alias for byte Vector
